description: Inspired by the English rock band in the late 70s and into the 80s, the Motorhead X Roark Bommer 2.0 short offers versatility for athletes looking for quality performance without compromising on comfort and style. The short's built-in boxer brief liner is crafted with minimal paneling and flatlock seams to eliminate any chance of chafing, while a strategically placed cell pocket is sewn on the liner's thigh for a bounce-free run. With an ample amount of front and rear pockets for storing your essential items, ventilation paneling for breathability, and a DWR finish to keep you dry, you have all you need to explore the trails.
name: Roark Motorhead Bommer Shorts, 7" Inseam - Mens
